name: GraviDisc
description:
GraviDisc

GraviDisc is a "2d sidescroller" created from Unity, it is an exclusive game for Android.

The "Tron" themed game is based on the fact that the player controls a disc and must jump clicking on the right side of the screen, and changing the gravity clicking on the left side, in order to avoid obstacles and keeping on an infinite level in order to overcome your maximum score.

It was created in a Game Jam.

Developed on 2016.

The Team

Programmer  -  Valentín Gutiérrez Losada

Programmer  -  Sullivan Martin Guiton

Game Designer  -  Oriol Caminal Miró

Artist  -  Oriol Caminal Miró
